name: March on the spot
description: Gentle marching to raise heart rate and loosen hips.

name: Arm circles
description: Small to large circles forwards and backwards to warm shoulders.

name: Hip circles
description: Hands on hips, draw circles both directions to mobilise hips and lower back.

name: Dynamic hamstring reaches
description: Toe touches with a flat back, alternating legs to wake up hamstrings.

name: Jumping jacks
description: Light cardio to get blood flowing before heavier efforts.

name: Band pull-aparts
description: Light band tension, squeeze shoulder blades together for upper back activation.
